title: ABOUT THE WORLD BANK
content: You’re offline. This is a read only version of the page. Contact Us Sample Pages Sample Pages Page Full Page with Child Links Full Page without Child Links Blank Page Category Page with Side Navigation Page with Side Navigation and Sidebar English English Tiếng Việt русский português (Portugal) Bahasa Melayu français 中文(中国) español Sign in This page in: English Tiếng Việt Русский Português العربية Français 中文 Español The World Bank Group (World Bank/IFC/MIGA/ICSID, the “WBG”) relies on people like you to ensure that our projects are executed with integrity and benefit the people they are designed to help. If you have a specific concern about possible fraud or corruption involving a WBG project or WBG staff or vendor, please fill out this short form. Provide as much information and detail as you can. This record will help the WBG’s Integrity unit (INT) to properly evaluate your complaint. Thank you for your vigilance. Create New Complaint fsdfsdfsdfs Complaint Details For allegations related to WBG staff misconduct or inappropriate workplace behavior, other than fraud and corruption (e.g., harassment and retaliation) please contact the WBG’s Ethics and Internal Justice Services: askeij@worldbankgroup.org. For concerns pertaining to adverse impacts on project-affected communities, please contact the World Bank’s Grievance Redress Service (GRS): grievances@worldbank.org. Interested parties may file procurement-related complaints in Bank’s financed projects, find detailed information in Project Procurement Complaints. Please visit the World Bank’s Access to Information website if you are interested in information about projects, documents and data, statistics and publications. For verification of employment for WBG employees, please contact the World Bank's Human Resources Service Center: (202) 473-2222 or hrservicecenter@worldbank.org. Scams and Fraudulent Investment Schemes that Misuse the World Bank’s name: https://www.worldbank.org/en/about/legal/scams Country where the World Bank project is located Afghanistan Albania Algeria American Samoa Andorra Angola Anguilla Antarctica Antigua and Barbuda Argentina Armenia Aruba Australia Austria Azerbaijan Bahamas, The Bahrain Bangladesh Barbados Belarus Belgium Belize Benin Bermuda Bhutan Bolivia Bosnia and Herzegovina Botswana Bouvet Island Brazil British Indian Ocean Territory Brunei Darussalam Bulgaria Burkina Faso Burundi Cabo Verde Cambodia Cameroon Canada Cayman Islands Central African Republic Chad Chile China Christmas Island Cocos (Keeling) Islands Colombia Commonwealth of Independent States Comoros Congo, Democratic Republic of Congo, Republic of Cook Islands Costa Rica Cote d'Ivoire Croatia Cuba Cyprus Czech Republic Czechoslovakia Denmark Djibouti Dominica Dominican Republic Ecuador Egypt, Arab Republic of El Salvador Equatorial Guinea Eritrea Estonia Estonia Eswatini Ethiopia Falkland Islands (Malvinas) Faroe Islands Fiji Finland France French Guiana French Polynesia French Southern Territories Gabon Gambia, The Georgia German Democratic Republic Germany Ghana Gibraltar Greece Greenland Grenada Guadeloupe Guam Guatemala Guernsey Guinea Guinea-Bissau Guyana Haiti Heard Island and McDonald Islands Holy See (Vatican City State) Honduras Hong Kong SAR, China Hungary Iceland India Indonesia Iran, Islamic Republic of Iraq Ireland Isle of Man Israel Italy Jamaica Japan Jersey, C.I. NoAre WBG staff involved in the suspected fraud or corruption? Yes Please provide as much information and detail as possible, including who, what, when, where, why, and how. For example: Tell us about yourself (required). I am a: Bidder Concerned Citizen Contractor( e.g., World Bank Supplier, Contractor, Consultant) Media NGO Project Beneficiary Project Official Public Official World Bank Staff Other Attached Documents Count Attached File Names Contact InformationThe World Bank will still review your complaint even if you wish to remain anonymous. Please provide us with at least an email address so that we may be able to contact you for additional information or clarification. Do you wish to remain anonymous? (If you want to be contacted by us please include a suitable means and time to reach you).Do you wish to remain anonymous? (If you want to be contacted by us please include a suitable means and time to reach you). NoDo you wish to remain anonymous? (If you want to be contacted by us please include a suitable means and time to reach you). Yes Email Address (required) Phone Number (Country Code-Number) First Name Last Name Mailing Address All information provided will be treated in the strictest confidence. Your personal data will only be used and disclosed for the purpose for which it was collected, or otherwise in accordance with the INT Privacy Notice. Registered User NoRegistered User Yes Preferred Language English French Russian Chinese Portugese Arabic Spanish Vietnamese TabIf you have multiple files to support your report, please be sure to attach them all at the same time. Any follow-up clicks to the “Choose Files” button will delete all attached files before allowing for new ones. If you have any evidence to support your report, please attach files here. partnership: No mention of partnership or collaboration
